turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like you to order some pizzas from Gina's for the girls from my book club, we will be meeting at 6 pm tonight.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I can do that, are you wanting Gina's on Main Street in Flushing?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. I'd like to order a variety of things in case there is a non pizza eating person there.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So how many pizzas do you want me to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like 2 large pizzas. 1 with pepperoni & bacon and the other with ham & pineapple. I also like to order some wings.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: They have 10 & 20 piece wings with hot medium & mild sauce. Battered & unbattered.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Probably better get 10 medium & 10 hot, not battered. If they have dipping sauce, I'd like ranch.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok so 2 large pizzas and 2 10 piece wings. I there going to be more?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, the girls like the bread sticks so 2 orders of breadsticks should work.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do they have parmesan or motzerella cheese on them?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: They have both but I'd prefer motzerella chees on both orders.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your making me hungry. Do you want sauce with the bread sticks?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, marinara and ranch, extra of each if they will give it to you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I'm sure they will.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: If you could , ask them to please send paper plates and napkins with the order. We will be eating outside.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: OK. We have 2 large pizzas, 1 pepperoni & Bacon, 1 ham & pineapple. 2 10 piece wings, 1 med, 1 hot, both not battered. Ranch Sauce for dipping. And 2 orders of bread sticks with motzerella cheese, pizza sauce & ranch (extra) for dipping. Paper plates & napkins.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Sounds like you have it correct

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your pizza order is complete and the pizzas will be ready for pickup in about 25 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank You very much!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You are very welcome! Your receipt will be sent to your mobile device via text message.
